full_summary:
**Parks Canada Visitor Experience Strategy**
==============================================

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

The Government of Canada invites applications from qualified suppliers for the provision of planning, facilitation, and writing services for site-specific Visitor Experience Strategies (VES) at National Parks, National Historic Sites, National Marine Conservation Areas or National Urban Parks.

**REQUIREMENT**
---------------

The successful supplier will assist Parks Canada in creating a compelling visitor experience offer for its target markets, enabling them to meet revenue targets, attendance targets, and measurable performance outcomes. The services will be based on Parks Canada's established VES methodology.

**Eligibility and Contract Value**
--------------------------------

The Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) is open to local Canadian companies and First Nations Band Small Businesses/Partnerships (in Ontario) with a valid Business Number. Contracts resulting from the SA will typically range from $1,000 to $500,000 (HST included).

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes providing planning, facilitation, and writing services to develop a VES for one or more locations. The services may include:

* Conducting research and stakeholder engagement
* Developing a compelling visitor experience offer
* Creating measurable performance outcomes and revenue targets
* Providing project management and coordination

**Evaluation and Contracting**
-----------------------------

The RFSA will be evaluated on a pass/fail basis. Qualified suppliers will be selected based on their ability to meet the requirements and deliver the services within the established timeline. Contracts will be awarded to the selected suppliers for a period of two years, with the option to extend for an additional year.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

The RFSA is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the duration of the arrangement to allow new suppliers to become qualified.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries or questions regarding the RFSA, please contact Christine Lajoie at (343) 585-2762 or christine.lajoie@pc.gc.ca.

**Solicitation and Tender Information**
-------------------------------------

To access the solicitation and tender information, please visit the Government of Canada's procurement website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Addenda, when issued, will be available on the same website.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Publication Date: August 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date
